column4: hu me mbɔbɔr; na ɔdasanyi repɛ amen me: Adzekyee nyina ɔdze ɔko hiahia mo ho."

column2: "M’atamfo repɛ amen me adzekyee nyina: Na hɔn a wɔama hɔnho do nye me roko dɔɔ so."

column3: Medze mo werɛ hyɛ wo mu."

column2: "Nyankopɔn mu na mibeyi n’asɛm ayɛw: Nyankopɔn mu na medze mo werɛ mahyɛ
column3: murunnsuro; Nyimpa botum ayɛ me dɛn?"

column2: "Adzekyee nyina na wosi me nsɛm tsir adze: Bɔn nko ara na wɔdwen tsia me."
"Aso wɔnam emumuyɛ do befi nsa? Ao Nyankopɔn
column3: fa aman hwehwe famu wɔ ebufuw mu."

column2: "Ɔwo na ibu mo nkwankwambɔ ano; Fa me nyinsuwa gu wo toa mu. Ana wonnyi wo nwoma mu?"
"Ɔno na m’atamfo bɛsan ekyir wɔ da a musu frɛ wo no: Iyi na minyim
column3: dɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ hɔ ma me."

column2: "Nyankopɔn mu na mibeyi n’asɛm ayɛw: EWURADZE mu na mibeyi n’asɛm ayɛw."
"Nyankopɔn mu na medze mo werɛ mahyɛ

column3: w’anohobadze wɔ mo hɔ: Mobɔbɔ ndaase afɔr ama wo."

column2: "Na ɔwo na agye me kra efi owu mu: Ana ɔwo innyii m’anan mmfii asehwe mu? Ama maanantsew Nyankopɔn enyim Wɔ nkwa kan no mu."
